metadata.synopsis: One-liner for the Wizard3 from the Eastway's Wizards Vignette: : a trio of young mages do a Gandalf and put on a light and sound show for passersby on the plaza in front of Sorcerous Sundries. This wizard is named Astoundo the Lesser.
metadata.how_to_trigger: talk to the wizard3 in the group of wizards and stragglers around the fountain nearby the Sorcerous Sundries.

0.speaker: Astoundo the Lesser
0.text: Yeah! I mean, yea, verily, behold and stuff! Just like Astoundo the Greater says!
